name: Munchee Kome Rice Cracker BBQ
description: Munchee Rice Cracker uses the nation's staple grain to create a wholesome and tasty snack. It has a unique texture, light yet full of satisfying goodness. It is available in four delightful flavours, Regular, Cheese & Chillie, BBQ, Onion, Prawn & Sweet Fantasy. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
